message.title: Cybernow expertise serving seniors
message.description: Cybernow Seniors is a specialized division of Cybernow, a Quebec cybersecurity company. We bring our technical expertise with a human, patient approach adapted to seniors' needs. Your first consultation is free and without commitment.

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: Solutions adapted to your digital needs

proactiveShield.title: Digital protection
proactiveShield.shortDescription: Securing your devices and preventive advice.
proactiveShield.description: We secure your devices with reliable protection software and teach you to recognize threats. Our support allows you to browse with confidence.

faq.question: What software do you install?
faq.answer: We recommend and install free and recognized antiviruses like Windows Defender, or paid solutions according to your needs.

faq.question: Can I call you if I have a problem?
faq.answer: Yes, you can contact us during business hours. We will take the time to guide you step by step.

privacyConsent.title: Privacy & consents
privacyConsent.shortDescription: We help you manage what you share.
privacyConsent.description: We support you in managing your personal data online. Learn to control what you share and with whom.

faq.question: What does the privacy audit include?
faq.answer: We check all your online accounts and show you what information is public or shared.

faq.question: How long does configuration take?
faq.answer: Between 1 to 2 hours depending on the number of accounts to secure.

onlineHelp.title: Help with procedures
onlineHelp.description: We assist you with all your daily digital procedures. From online banking to creating secure accounts.

faq.question: Can I trust you with my passwords?
faq.answer: We never keep your passwords. We teach you to use a secure manager.

faq.question: Do you help with all banks?
faq.answer: Yes, we know the interfaces of all major Quebec banks.

scamSupport.title: Support in case of scam
scamSupport.description: If you have been a victim or suspect a scam, we analyze the situation and guide you through the protection steps.

faq.question: What to do if I gave my information?
faq.answer: Contact us immediately. We will guide you to secure your accounts urgently.

faq.question: Can we recover the lost money?
faq.answer: We support you with procedures with your bank and the relevant authorities.

jean.name: Jean Tremblay
jean.bio: Cybersecurity expert at Cybernow, Jean leads this new specialized division for seniors. He combines Cybernow's technical expertise with a human and patient approach, adapted to seniors' specific needs.

marie.name: Marie Gagnon
marie.bio: Former teacher turned digital expert at Cybernow, Marie excels at explaining complex concepts simply. Her teaching skills and empathy make her the ideal advisor to support seniors.

pierre.name: Pierre Lavoie
pierre.bio: Data protection expert at Cybernow, Pierre is passionate about digital privacy. He helps seniors regain control of their online information and understand their rights in accessible language.

sophie.name: Sophie Roy
sophie.bio: Customer experience manager at Cybernow, Sophie coordinates the Seniors team and ensures every senior receives personalized support. Her warm approach and attentive listening put everyone at ease.
